body: It was really good until the ugly bastard's came in
The underwater fart inhaling really was something else. Idk what to say
Love the story and the art masterfully drawn and the translation was excellently done keep up the great work.
Great art, terrible story. Classic fucking Futa artists. Sets it up as pure MC slowly becomes futa succubus via corrupting her friends... THEN THROWS IT ALL OUT THE WINDOW.
The art is great, but scat and what not is just disgusting. Wonder why the author would make something like this. Does he or she get much money from his niche target audience?
